#summary An example of how to run JAFFA

= Introduction =

To get you started, here, we provide a small demo of how to run JAFFA.
We will use the first 1 million read pairs from one of the ENCDOE MCF-7 
RNA-Seq datasets (SRA...). You can download this small example dataset 
from [address here]. These reads are 100bp paired end, which means we
can show all three modes of JAFFA: assembly, direct and hybrid.
